TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ThrowActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity implements class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Models the throwing of an exception. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
The purpose of the ThrowActivity is to allow declarative modeling of the throwing of an exception. The ThrowActivity is functionally equivalent to a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity whose code-beside handler throws the indicated exception.
## Examples The following code shows the use of a single throw activity in a workflow to implement exception handling. This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkflow.cs file. For more information, see [Using Throw](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#178](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets11.cs#178)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#178](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets11.vb#178)]

This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkflow.cs file. For more information, see [Using Throw](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other. Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
